timeline.message:
Tidy up jpp_configuration.xml

* remove JAVA14 configuration
* remove obsolete flag: AnnotateOverride
* remove unused flag: Sidecar15
* sort classpath entries
* use whitespace consistently

Signed-off-by: Keith W. Campbell <keithc@ca.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: @tajila Are you aware of any uses of the PANAMA jcl config today?  If not, I won't worry about moving the base from 14 -> 15
timeline.author: DanHeidinga

replies.bodyText: If it's not in use, perhaps it's time for it to be deleted?
replies.author: keithc-ca

replies.bodyText: The Panama native-interop JDK has likely changed substantially since we last supported it, I doubt the config will work with the latest prototype. The PANAMA config can be deleted and the related MH code can be removed as well.
replies.author: tajila

replies.bodyText: Removing PANAMA seems to be a bigger piece of work: I opened #10377 to track that.
replies.author: keithc-ca
